body: Hi all, i have just noticed this funny thing when i create a new RAD material.. As you can see from the following image, even if my input for RGB is 0.719335202, the RAD material present 0.784. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/cCBEHEx*jFeRGhKWWNzFN6dnY20PamoPV1jdIqmaciuu7YQ8ecs6G46olGS0nV33NJAiqUEmUy98LfZNAIBeX0AplraLrOL9/glass.PNG) Do you know why? Thanks a lot in advance Claudia
